title: S13 Ep17: The Gore and Horror of the Garnett House
itunes:title: The Gore and Horror of the Garnett House
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS is confronted with the Gore & Horror of The Garnett House with guests Justin Spurrier & Rob Garcia.

Can a property be possessed and lead its inhabitants to maim or kill? What is the terrifying truth about the Garnett House and why has so much tragedy taken place there? Justin & Rob share insights and hair raising stories of the history and modern day haunting that continues to take place there today.

Visit their site here: http://www.1858hotel.com/

www.DDPYoga.com go there now to save 20% off on select items thru January 2018!

www.TrueCar.com
